name: Subway Surfers 2018 - Pet vs Police
description:
Remember Subway Surfers? Subway Surfers 2018 - American street style adventure game, Pet and police escape wars. Super chase, waiting for your challenge ！

Run as fast as you can while jumping, dodging, rolling and knocking off the track in action-packed levels.

Rush to collect and play exciting Special Missions to increase your score, unlock new characters and 50+ items, and 100 levels to await your challenge! 10 hours of game time!
